title: Shattered Pieces
description: What the hell just happened? Is this even real?Well, it's my life, so I'm not really surprised to find myself in the center of yet another shit storm.I'm starting this new chapter of my life in the middle of a nightmare. One that I can't seem to wake up from.With my stalker revealed, I find myself with a whole new set of worries.But I need to have faith that with all these amazing people on my side, we're gonna be fine.Unfortunately, my last year isn't over at Emerald Lake Prep yet. But with new changes and relationships starting, I know it won't be anything short of an adventure.Especially, when I find myself to be the leading cause of a war breaking out between the Phantom Reapers and the Savage Hellhounds.One thing I know for sure, I won't go down without a fight.Join me in the last half of my senior year of high school. It's sure to be full of action, drama, and mind-blowing sex. But what else is new?
author: Alisha Williams
